Case Study

Isaah Trucking

Isaah Trucking is a licensed auto transport company offering safe and reliable vehicle shipping across the US.

Problem Statement

Isaah Truckingâ€™s previous website was unclear and difficult to navigate, causing potential customers to struggle with understanding services and requesting quotes. This led to lower conversions and missed opportunities.

Possible Solution

I redesigned the website with a clean, user-friendly interface, emphasizing ease of navigation and trust-building elements. The mobile-first design and streamlined quote request process improved user engagement and boosted conversions.

Target Audience

Isaah Trucking's target audience includes individual vehicle owners, car dealerships, and fleet managers across the U.S. seeking reliable and affordable auto transport services. These users prioritize convenience, trust, and a seamless online experience when requesting transport quotes or scheduling vehicle shipments.

The Approach

I started with research to understand user needs and competitor sites. Using this, I created user personas and designed a clean, mobile-first, responsive interface. My focus was on streamlining navigation and improving the quote request process. After testing and refining based on feedback, I launched the site and monitored it for ongoing optimization.

Design Process

Emphatize

Define

Ideate

Design

Test

Project Timeline

Project Typography

Poppins is a modern, elegant sans-serif font known for its clean and neat appearance. Its excellent readability and variety of styles make it a versatile choice, which is why I selected it for this project.

ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ

abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz

1234567890

Project Colors

The client provided red and orange as their brand colors. I chose additional colors for the text and some backgrounds, prioritizing clear visibility and strong contrast.

#FF8500

#CB1E0A

#2A3845

#19222B

#E2E6EC

#696A6D

Visual Design

The visual design uses a clean layout with the brand colors, red and orange, paired with complementary text for clarity. White space and balanced elements highlight key sections and actions.

Website Header

The design features a clear navigation bar, a bold hero banner with a call-to-action, and a simple services section. It highlights key offerings for a user-friendly, engaging experience.

About Company

This design effectively conveys Isaah Trucking's commitment to customer satisfaction, eco-friendly practices, and building trust. The use of clear headings and concise language makes the company's values easily understandable.

Building Trust

The design effectively buildâ€™s customer trust and showcases the company's reliability and positive customer experiences through statistics and testimonials.

Contact Form

I combined a simple contact form with a visually appealing map, making it convenient for users to find the company's location and get in touch.

The Results

The improved navigation and clear calls-to-action boosted user engagement. Company experienced a rise in quote requests and contact form submissions, showing higher conversion rates. Users also gave positive feedback on the websiteâ€™s design and functionality.

Lessons Learned

Iâ€™ve learned that a website needs to look good and be easy to use. Getting user feedback early helps improve the design. Clear navigation makes it easier for users to find what they need. The site must work well on mobile devices. And, keeping an eye on the site after launch helps fix any problems quickly.
